history.proof: induction A as [|a A IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "x :: A ++ B" in the current goal.
In environment X : Type x, a : X A, B : list X H : x :: A ++ B <<= A ++ x :: B H0 : A ++ x :: B <<= x :: A ++ B Unable to unify "a :: A ++ x :: B" with "a :: A ++ B".

original: induction A as [|a A IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- equi_push. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
